entry.title: Midnight Visitor's
entry.summary:
Author: Kandyscorner

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,409Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Originally requested on Tumblr:Hello,I wanted to request one of the batboys (1 or more) whoever you want sneaking in Jason and Reader’s apartment (not knowing abt Reader) to catch a break during patrol, and Jason coming back and getting mad at them for breaking in or breaking in AND waking reader up (up to you which one) and that’s how reader meets the Bats (Jason and Reader can have a pet but I’m whatever abt that).

  • No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Jason Todd/Reader
  • Red Hood/Reader
  • Batfam/reader
  • Jason Todd
  • Tim Drake
  • Damian Wayne
  • siblings being siblings
  • Batfam being terrible at communicating
  • there is a dog
  • Jason Todd being in love
